name: King Rabbit
description:
The game starts by introducing new mechanics in a natural and exploratory way. You don't need a tutorial, simply control King Rabbit with the arrow keys. As you progress the difficulty will increase, meanwhile you're mastering the nuances of each item and how it interacts with the world. You might find your brain hurting, but the casual nature of King Rabbit allows you to take as much time and as many lives as you need.

  • Discover secret areas
  • Recover your Kingdom's treasure
  • Save rabbit citizens from baddies

Wishlist to get a notification when its available
